nodes.text: House Cormond was a noble house on the Core Worlds planet of Brentaal IV. During the final decades of the Galactic Republic's reign, they employed a bodyguard, but he left their services and the Core after receiving a lucrative offer to oversee security for House Elegin on the planet Asmeru.
House Cormond was first mentioned in 2014 in Tarkin, a novel by James Luceno.
